content.description: Sit start on great incut crimps/pods, move up to the cool sidepull, and top out.
content.location: This is on the far left face around the corner from the problems The Gambler and Body Bag.

content.description: Sit start with incut crimps/pods, and make a crux move right to really small crimp. Lock off and move up to top out.
content.location: Start a few feet right of the problem Shell Game.

content.description: Sit start a foot or two left of the left arête with a low left hold and a right pinch on the arête. Move up using the big, flat shelf for feet, then move right onto the center of the face, then head straight up, and top out. It is a classic highball with a crappy landing.
content.location: Start a foot or two left of the left arête.

content.description: Stand start the wide crack, and make your way up into the narrow chimney. Once you've squeezed your way into the chimney, grovel your way to the lip, and squeeze your way over the top.
content.protection: Pads, you probably could put a toprope over this if you were motivated to do so.
content.location: If you're looking at the distinctive cave of the rainbow, walk to the left and up the hill, and look for the big crack. This is the crack above the largest opening to the cave.

content.description: Stand start the cool looking arête with a flat jug, and move left using a few crimpy sidepulls and crappy feet. Match up high on thin feature on the arête, and top out on the slopey lip. This problem moves left after a few moves. Heading more or less straight up is an easier version.

pathTokens: Cavalry Boulder Field aka Gymnasium aka Playground

content.description: The huge, tall block on your left that faces you as you approach the Alcove.
